name: Vigoro River Rock Pebbles - Landscape Enhancement & Erosion Control
description: This Vigoro 0.5 cu. ft. Pond Pebbles Landscape Rock is a great way to enhance the appearance of your landscape. This medium-sized rock spreads easily and helps control erosion. It will also help retain moisture in the soil.Easy installationControls erosion to help protect your landscape0.5 cu. ft. bag covers approximately 3 sq. ft. when spread 2 in. thickAll online orders for this item may arrive in multiple packages
